attributes.action: Create a Governing Body to Monitor the Media and Press.
attributes.additional_details: The Media are making the news and not just reporting it. They need to be reigned in. They are supposed to be self regulating but it just isn’t happening.
attributes.background: We need the Government to appoint a regulatory body / committee to keep the press to the job their meant to be doing.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300246
